org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class AutomatonCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AutomatonCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAltAutomatonCodec, FSACodec, GameCodec

    public abstract class AutomatonCodec
extends XMLCodec
    An AutomatonCodec provides methods for encoding an automaton in GOAL file format (GFF) and decoding a GFF file back to an automaton.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

      • addRootAttributes

        protected void addRootAttributes(Automaton aut,
                                 org.w3c.dom.Element root)
        Inserts attributes to the root element.
        Parameters:
        aut - the automaton to be encoded
        root - the root element of the GFF file

      • getType

        public abstract java.lang.String getType()
        Returns the type of the automaton to be encoded or decoded. The type will appear in the GFF file as an attribute of the root element.
        Returns:
        the unique type name of the automaton to be encoded or decoded

      • isTypeAccepted

        public boolean isTypeAccepted(java.lang.String type)
        Returns true if a type is accepted by this codec. When this codec writes on an XML file, the only one type from #getType() will be used. But when reading an XML file, this codec may want to accept more types as aliases.
        Parameters:
        type - a type read
        Returns:
        true if the type is accepted by this codec

      • decodeStateIDSet

        protected State[] decodeStateIDSet(Automaton aut,
                                   org.w3c.dom.NodeList states)
                            throws CodecException
        Decodes a NodeList as a set of state IDs and returns the states with that IDs in the automaton to be decoded.
        Parameters:
        aut - the automaton to be decoded
        states - a NodeList representing a set of state IDs
        Returns:
        the states with IDs represented by states in aut
        Throws:
        CodecException - if some state cannot be found in aut

      • decodeTransitionIDSet

        protected Transition[] decodeTransitionIDSet(Automaton aut,
                                             org.w3c.dom.NodeList trans)
                                      throws CodecException
        Decodes a NodeList as a set of transition IDs and returns the transitions with that IDs in the automaton to be decoded.
        Parameters:
        aut - the automaton to be decoded
        trans - a NodeList representing a set of transition IDs
        Returns:
        the transitions with IDs represented by states in aut
        Throws:
        CodecException - if some transition cannot be found in aut

      • encodeStateIDSet

        protected org.w3c.dom.Element[] encodeStateIDSet(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                                 State[] states)
        Encodes a set of states as a set of XML elements. Each element represents the ID of the corresponding state.
        Parameters:
        doc - the XML document
        states - states to be encoded
        Returns:
        XML elements corresponding to state IDs of states

      • encodeTransitionIDSet

        protected org.w3c.dom.Element[] encodeTransitionIDSet(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                                      Transition[] trans)
        Encodes a set of transitions as a set of XML elements. Each element represents the ID of the corresponding transition.
        Parameters:
        doc - the XML document
        trans - transitions to be encoded
        Returns:
        XML elements corresponding to transition IDs of trans

      • encodeProperties

        protected org.w3c.dom.Element encodeProperties(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                               Editable obj,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> excludes)
        Encodes other properties of an editable object as an element in an XML document.
        Parameters:
        doc - an XML document
        obj - an editable object
        excludes - built-in properties that should be excluded
        Returns:
        an XML element in doc representing other properties of obj

        Parameters:

        obj - an editable object
        excludes - built-in properties that should be excluded
        Throws:
        CodecException - if e is not well-formed

                         Automaton aut)
                  throws CodecException
        Decodes a state of the automaton to be decoded.
        Parameters:
        e - the XML element representing a state
        aut - the automaton corresponding to the GFF file
        Returns:
        the state represented by e
        Throws:
        CodecException - if the decoding of e fails

      • decodeTransition

        public Transition decodeTransition(org.w3c.dom.Element e,
                                   Automaton aut)
                            throws CodecException
        Decodes an XML element as a transition.
        Parameters:
        e - an XML element to be decoded
        aut - the automaton corresponding to the GFF file to be decoded
        Returns:
        the transition in aut represented by e
        Throws:
        CodecException - if the tag name or the tid attribute is invalid, or the source state or the destination state cannot be found in aut

      • encodeAcc

        public void encodeAcc(org.w3c.dom.Element e,
                      Acc<?> acc)
        Encodes an acceptance condition as an XML element.
        Parameters:
        e - the XML element representing the acceptance condition acc
        acc - an acceptance condition to be encoded

      • decodeAcc

        public Acc<?> decodeAcc(org.w3c.dom.Element e,
                        Automaton aut)
                 throws CodecException
        Decodes an XML element as an acceptance condition.
        Parameters:
        e - an XML element to be decoded
        aut - the automaton represented by the GFF file to be decoded
        Returns:
        the acceptance condition represented by e
        Throws:
        CodecException - if the tag name or type attribute is invalid, or the states or the transitions in the acceptance condition cannot be found in aut

      • getRoot

        protected org.w3c.dom.Element getRoot(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                               throws CodecException
        Returns the root element of a GFF document.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to be decoded
        Returns:
        the root element of doc
        Throws:
        CodecException - if the tag name of the root element is invalid or there are more than one root elements

      • getType

        protected java.lang.String getType(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                            throws CodecException
        Returns the automaton type of a GFF document.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to be decoded
        Returns:
        the type of the automaton represented by doc
        Throws:
        CodecException - if the type of the automaton represented by doc is different from the type supported by this codec

                             throws CodecException

        Parameters:
        doc - the document to be decoded
        Returns:
        the label position of the automaton represented by doc
        Throws:
        CodecException - if it fails to get the root element or the label position cannot be recognized

      • createAutomaton

        protected abstract Automaton createAutomaton(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                      throws CodecException
        Creates a new instance of an automaton with the same type as the automaton type specified by the document to be decoded.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to be decoded
        Returns:
        a new automaton with the same type as the automaton type specified by doc
        Throws:
